definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: The financial impact of treating obesity and obesity-related disease is substantial.
sentences.chinese: 注入肥胖症的财务冲击和与肥胖有关的疾病是可观的。

sentences.english: We will be making substantial profit on the first flight.
sentences.chinese: 首航我们就能赚可观的钱。

sentences.english: In this paper, a concept of the degree of observable redundancy is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了状态完全可观冗余度的概念。

sentences.english: Considerable cross-national convergence in life expectancy will occur.
sentences.chinese: 预期寿命将会出现可观的跨国趋同。

sentences.english: But with enough volume, the profits can add up.
sentences.chinese: 但是业务量巨大，利润就相当可观了。
他拥有相当可观的房地产。

sentences.english: Following these rhymes, comes that valuable section of prose material which is generally called experience stories.
sentences.chinese: 韵语之后，是颇为可观的散文部分“生活故事”。

sentences.english: The comprehensive water-saving project brings about a considerable direct economic value to Yangcheng Power Plant.
sentences.chinese: 综合节水项目为阳城电厂带来了可观的直接经济价值。

sentences.english: They not only protect health. They bring in considerable revenue.
sentences.chinese: 他们不仅保护健康，还将带来可观的收入。

sentences.english: Huishi's knowledge was all-inclusive. His works were fairly many.
sentences.chinese: 惠施的知识包罗万象，他的著作也极可观。

sentences.english: It was a short walk from the Tai Wai East Rail MTR Station, and the shopfront is impressive.
sentences.chinese: 从大围地铁站行走一小段路，店面可是蛮可观的。

sentences.english: South Yuhuangding peak, known for impressive sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 峰南玉皇顶，因可观日出而闻名。

sentences.english: Regional organizations such as APEC have already shown considerable progress in these areas.
sentences.chinese: 亚太经合组织等地区组织已在这些领域取得可观进展。

sentences.english: He's put aside a tidy sum for his retirement.
sentences.chinese: 他存了一笔相当可观的钱以备退休之用。

sentences.english: For the investors who had bought the bond, the capital gain would have been quite significant.
sentences.chinese: 那些在价低时买进的投资者，可赚了相当可观的利润。

sentences.english: You can get phenomenal returns if you present your ideas to those who can back your interests.
sentences.chinese: 向能给予你支持的人陈述观点会有可观的回报。
